About me

Hey, my name is Nikolina and I am a frontend developer with passion for UI/UX. I am originally from Bulgaria, but I have been living in Copenhagen for the past 4 years. I am a bachelor in Software engineering and I have around 4 years of experience as a Frontend developer.

I can say I am best at HTML & CSS and improving in JavaScript. I am very detail oriented person and i strive for perfection. If you want to find out more about my proffessional background, you can download my resume

Well, it is pretty obviuos my website is still under design and construction, but if you want some "behind the scenes" you can check my GitHub profile.
